sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar
        fixed
        dark
        dense
        style="background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(187, 111, 59), rgb(0, 0, 0))"
        shrink-on-scroll
        height="220px"
        src='../../../../../assets/images/stage.png'
        scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-2"
        fade-img-on-scroll
        scroll-threshold="400"
        app
        :style="appbarStyle"
    >
      <template v-slot:img="{ props }">
        <v-img
            v-bind="props"
            gradient="to top, rgba(0,0,0,.8), rgba(0,0,0,.2)"
        ></v-img>
      </template>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon :size="`10px`" @click="isShow = !isShow" class="toggleUpDown" :class='{ "rotate": isShow }'></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
      <v-toolbar-title :style="`${this.fontStyle}`">
        Heavify
      </v-toolbar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-magnify</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-heart</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-dots-vertical</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      isShow: false,
    }
  },
  computed: {
    iconsStyle() {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'xs': return "width: 10px !important;height:10px !important; position: relative; top:6px; left:12px;"
        case 'sm': return "font-size:12px;position:relative;top: -6px !important;left: -22px !important;"
        case 'md': return "font-size:16px;position:relative;top: -4px !important;left: -22px !important;"
        case 'lg': return "font-size:22px;position:relative;left: -22px !important;"
        case 'xl': return "font-size:28px;position:relative;top: 7px !important;left: -22px !important;"
      }
    },
    fontStyle() {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'xs': return "font-size:9px;position:relative;top: -6px !important;left: -22px !important;"
        case 'sm': return "font-size:12px;position:relative;top: -6px !important;left: -22px !important;"
        case 'md': return "font-size:16px;position:relative;top: -4px !important;left: -22px !important;"
        case 'lg': return "font-size:22px;position:relative;left: -22px !important;"
        case 'xl': return "font-size:28px;position:relative;top: 7px !important;left: -22px !important;"
      }
    },
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .v-toolbar__title {
    font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif;
  }

  .toggleUpDown {
    transition: transform .2s ease-in-out !important;
  }

  .toggleUpDown.rotate {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
  }
</style>
